title: MX Record Lookup
description: Verify mail exchange servers and priority for any domain to ensure email deliverability.

seo.question: How do I check MX records?

title: IP Blacklist Check
description: Check if an IP or domain is listed on major real-time blackhole lists (RBLs) like Spamhaus.

title: DMARC Lookup
description: Retrieve and validate the DMARC record to prevent email spoofing.

title: What Is My IP?
description: Instantly detect your public IPv4 and IPv6 address and ISP details.

title: SSL/TLS Checker
description: Analyze the SSL certificate chain, expiry date, and issuer information.

title: Whois Lookup
description: Query the WHOIS database for domain registration and ownership details.

title: A Record Lookup
description: Find the IPv4 address associated with a domain.

title: AAAA Record Lookup
description: Find the IPv6 address associated with a domain.

title: CNAME Lookup
description: Find the canonical name (alias) for a domain.

title: TXT Lookup
description: View text records often used for verification (Google, SPF, etc).

title: NS Lookup
description: Identify the authoritative name servers for a domain.

title: SOA Lookup
description: View the Start of Authority record for zone administration info.

title: SRV Lookup
description: Locate services like SIP or Minecraft servers.

title: Reverse DNS (PTR)
description: Perform a reverse lookup to find the hostname of an IP address.

title: SPF Record Lookup
description: Extract and validate the SPF policy from TXT records.

title: DKIM Lookup
description: Check DomainKeys Identified Mail records (requires selector).

title: BIMI Lookup
description: Check for Brand Indicators for Message Identification records.

title: MTA-STS Lookup
description: Check Mail Transfer Agent Strict Transport Security policy.

title: DNSKEY Lookup
description: Retrieve the public key used to verify DNSSEC signatures.

title: DS Lookup
description: Delegation Signer record check for DNSSEC.

title: NSEC Lookup
description: Next Secure record check.

title: RRSIG Lookup
description: Resource Record Signature check.

title: Ping Test (TCP)
description: Measure latency to a server using TCP handshake.

title: TCP Port Check
description: Verify if a specific port is open on a target server.

title: HTTP Headers
description: Inspect the HTTP response headers of a website.

title: Redirect Tracer
description: Trace the path of URL redirects.

title: Domain Health
description: Comprehensive check of a domain's DNS and mail health.

title: ASN Lookup
description: Find information about an Autonomous System Number.

title: LOC Lookup
description: Check geographical location records in DNS.

title: CAA Lookup
description: Certificate Authority Authorization check.

title: Test Email Server
description: Simulate an SMTP connection to test availability.
